fhh_index.usage: Using My Family Health Portrait you can:
fhh_index.li2: Learn about your risk for conditions that can run in families.
fhh_index.li3: Print your family health history to share with family or your health care provider.
fhh_index.li4: Save your family health history so you can update it over time.
fhh_index.talking: Talking with your health care provider about your family health history can help you stay healthy!
fhh_index.learn_more: Learn more about My Family Health Portrait

fhh_js.update_help_dialog_p: When creating your family member's information you will be asked to:
fhh_js.update_help_dialog_l1: Enter their personal information such as name, gender, date of birth, twin status, adopted status, height and weight.
fhh_js.update_help_dialog_l2: Enter their health information. This includes:
fhh_js.update_help_dialog_l2_l1: Selecting the disease or condition they may have by clicking on the drop-down selection box next to the 'Disease or Condition' label
fhh_js.update_help_dialog_l2_l2: If you select a disease or condition that has the words 'more options' next to it, you will be asked to give more information by clicking on the drop-down box next to the 'Please Specify' label
fhh_js.update_help_dialog_l2_l3: Select the age of onset from the ranges that are offered after clicking on the drop-down selection box next to 'Age at Diagnosis'
fhh_js.update_help_dialog_l2_l4: You can add more diseases or conditions after adding one to the list. You can also press on the 'Remove' link if the information doesn't appear correct
fhh_js.update_help_dialog_l3: Enter your family background. This includes:
fhh_js.update_help_dialog_l3_l2: Selecting the race and ethnic background for a family member. Please note that you can select more than one option within this list. You will also be able to provide more specific race information.
fhh_js.personal_help_dialog_p: When creating your personal information you will be asked to:
fhh_js.personal_help_dialog_l1: Enter your personal information such as name, gender, date of birth, twin status, adopted status, height and weight.
fhh_js.personal_help_dialog_l2: Enter your health information. This includes:
fhh_js.personal_help_dialog_l2_l1: Selecting the disease or condition you may have by clicking on the drop-down selection box next to the 'Disease or Condition' label
fhh_js.personal_help_dialog_l2_l2: If you select a disease or condition that has the words 'more options' next to it, you will be asked to give more information by clicking on the drop-down box next to the 'Please Specify' label
fhh_js.personal_help_dialog_l2_l3: Select the age of onset from the ranges that are offered after clicking on the drop-down selection box next to 'Age at Diagnosis'
fhh_js.personal_help_dialog_l2_l4: You can add more diseases or conditions after adding one to the list. You can also press on the 'Remove' link if the information doesn't appear correct
fhh_js.personal_help_dialog_l3: Enter your family background. This includes:
fhh_js.personal_help_dialog_l3_l1: Selecting whether your parents are related to each other in any way other than being married
fhh_js.personal_help_dialog_l3_l2: Selecting the race and ethnic background for a family member. Please note that you can select more than one option within this list. You will also be able to provide more specific race information.
fhh_js.load_help_dialog_title: Load Your Family Health History Help
fhh_js.load_help_dialog_h1: Help for Use a Saved Family Health History File
fhh_js.load_help_dialog_p1: If you have already created a family health history file or if someone has sent you a family health history file, you will be able to upload it.  Once uploaded, you can open it to see or edit the file. You can also create a copy for yourself or another family member.
fhh_js.load_help_dialog_p2: You will need to know where the file is saved on your local computer or removable drive. To upload a file:
fhh_js.load_help_dialog_p3: Please note that this site only accepts files of an '.xml' extension that were saved from this tool, and also accepts files of an '.htm' extension that were saved from this tool prior to January, 2009. Any other file types will not be accepted.
fhh_js.load_help_dialog_l1: Press on the 'Browse' button. This will open a new window.
fhh_js.load_help_dialog_l2: In the new window, you will have to go the directory that contains the file. The file will be of an '.xml' type.
fhh_js.load_help_dialog_l3: Select the file and press on the 'Open' button. This will close the new window.
fhh_js.load_help_dialog_l4: In the Use a Saved Family History window, press on the 'Next' button.
fhh_js.immediate_help_dialog_h1: Help for Add Immediate Family Information
fhh_js.immediate_help_dialog_p: Create a Family Tree. This includes:
fhh_js.immediate_help_dialog_l1: Typing in the number of brothers, sisters, daughters, and sons you have
fhh_js.immediate_help_dialog_l2: Typing in the number of brothers and sisters that your mother has
fhh_js.immediate_help_dialog_l3: Typing in the number of brothers and sisters that your father has
fhh_js.immediate_help_dialog_l4: Showing whether or not you would like to add grandparents to your family tree
fhh_js.confirm_delete: This will delete all data and restart,  Are you sure you want to do this?
fhh_js.add_relative_title: Who would you like to add to your history?
fhh_js.add_relative_para: Relatives in your immediate family who aren't listed here are probably on the previous page and can be reached by closing this window and selecting the plus sign image ('Add History') next to the relative's name. Spouses and second cousins are not listed because they don't impact your family health history.
fhh_js.aunt_relationship_q: Who is the aunt related to:
fhh_js.uncle_relationship_q: Who is the uncle related to:
fhh_js.cousin_parent_q: Who is the parent of your first cousin:
fhh_js.niece_parent_q: Who is the parent of your niece:
fhh_js.nephew_parent_q: Who is the parent of your nephew:
fhh_js.granddaughter_parent_q: Who is the parent of your granddaughter:
fhh_js.grandson_parent_q: Who is the parent of your grandson:
fhh_js.halfbrother_parent_q: Who is the parent of your half brother:
fhh_js.halfsister_parent_q: Who is the parent of your half sister:
fhh_js.invalid_data_alert: Some of the data you entered was invalid, please fix your errors and try again.
fhh_js.halfway_through_adding_disease: You have not saved the new disease information, please click 'Add' to add the disease first.
fhh_js.fathers_side: My Father's Side of the Family
fhh_js.mothers_side: My Mother's Side of the Family
fhh_js.name: Name
fhh_js.remove_q: Do you really want to remove
fhh_js.remove_q2: This will also delete all their children
fhh_js.add_disease_instructions: In the list below, select a Disease or Condition (if any) from the dropdown box. Then select the Age at Diagnosis and press the Add button. You may repeat this process as necessary.
fhh_js.race_south_pacific: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander
fhh_js.consanguinity: Check here if your parents are related to each other in any way other than marriage.
fhh_js.multiple_races_selectable: (multiple races and ethnicities may be selected)
fhh_js.ashkezani_q: Why are we asking about Ashkenazi Jewish heritage?
fhh_js.export_instructions: You may make your father, mother, brothers, sisters, and children be the center person of the family health history. This person can then add relatives from their families to create a new family health history without having to start from the very beginning.
fhh_js.export_instructions2: Your family health history is not saved on this website or any other system. You must save your family health history to your own local storage area (such as your computer's hard drive, a CD-ROM, or USB thumb drive), whether you are saving your own history or saving a copy for a family member.
fhh_js.export_instructions3: To copy for another family member, select the person to copy and click 'Copy and Save History.'
fhh_js.leave_page_warning: If you leave before saving your changes will be lost.
fhh_js.android: This Feature is not supported on the Android Browser

fhh_fhh.p_create_my_history: Select 'Create My History' to create your personal profile, enter your health information, and tell us how many people are in your immediate family. You can add other family members and enter their health histories later.
fhh_fhh.quick_guide_li1: Change your Family Health History by adding, removing or changing your relatives
fhh_fhh.quick_guide_li2: Use the tools to view your family tree diagram, find out your risks for certain diseases, or export your tree to help your close family member get started.
fhh_fhh.update_more_help: To find out more about what you can do, click on the 'Get Help' link on the menu bar above.
fhh_fhh.p_update_my_history_b1_before: Add information for a family member by pressing
fhh_fhh.p_update_my_history_b1_after: next to the name in the list.
fhh_fhh.p_update_my_history_b2_before: Change your information or a family member's information by pressing
fhh_fhh.p_update_my_history_b2_after: next to the name in the list or clicking the family member's name.
fhh_fhh.p_update_my_history_b3_before: Remove a family member from your history by pressing
fhh_fhh.p_update_my_history_b3_after: next to the name in the list. (You cannot remove yourself, your parents, or grandparents.)
fhh_fhh.p_update_my_history2_b1: Restart your family history by clicking on the 'Start Over' button
fhh_fhh.p_update_my_history2_b2: Save your history to a file on your computer or into the cloud by clicking on 'Save Data' button
fhh_fhh.p_update_my_history2_b3: Add another family member to your family history by clicking 'Add a Family Member' button
fhh_fhh.p_update_my_history2_b4: View a diagram of your family tree by clicking on 'Pedigree Drawing' button. Alternatively, you can click the 'Family Health Table' button to navigate to the table directly
fhh_fhh.p_update_my_history2_b5: Export your family information to give a close relative a headstart on his/her family tree by clicking on the 'Share Data' button
fhh_fhh.p_update_my_history2_b6: Use one of the Disease Risk Calculators to determine if you are at increased risk of a disease based on your family history by clicking on the 'Check Your Risk' button
fhh_fhh.p_update_my_history2_b7: Get additional Help by clicking on the 'Get Help For This Page' button
fhh_fhh.btn_save_my_history: Save Family History for Later Re-use
fhh_fhh.p_help_main_page: After adding immediate family information, you can:
fhh_fhh.li1_help_main_page: Check over the relatives in the family member table by doing the following:
fhh_fhh.li1_1_help_main_page: add health history for each family member by pressing on the symbol in the Add History column
fhh_fhh.li1_2_help_main_page: update health information for you or anyone by pressing on the symbol in the update history column
fhh_fhh.li1_3_help_main_page: remove a family member by pressing on the symbol in the remove relative column
fhh_fhh.li1_4_help_main_page: Add additional relatives by pressing the 'Add Another Family Member' button
fhh_fhh.li1_5_help_main_page: Save your family health history to your computer by clicking on 'Save Family History'
fhh_fhh.li2_help_main_page: On all pages including this page, you can also:
fhh_fhh.li2_1_help_main_page: Start a new history by pressing on 'Home.'
fhh_fhh.li2_2_help_main_page: Return to the screen showing a table of your family by pressing 'My Family.'
fhh_fhh.li2_3_help_main_page: Make a copy of your family health history for a family member by pressing 'Copy for Family Member.'
fhh_fhh.li2_4_help_main_page: View a diagram of your family tree and a table of your family health history by pressing 'View Diagram & Table.'
fhh_fhh.li2_5_help_main_page: Get extra help by pressing 'Get Help.'

info_dialog.instructions: We start the family health history with you. Enter the required personal information and your health history information. At the bottom of the page (you may need to scroll), press the 'Next' button. You will then be asked to tell the system which family members you would like to add to the health history.
info_dialog.health_vault: If you have a Microsoft HealthVault account, you can choose to copy your HealthVault family history information into this website.  Press 'Copy from HealthVault' to get started.
info_dialog.family_instructions: Enter required personal information and health history information for this family member. Background information may also be entered. At the bottom of the page (you may need to scroll), press the 'Save' button to save this person's information.
info_dialog.name: Name:
info_dialog.family_twin_status: Was this person born a twin?

fhh_add_family.instructions: Now we will build your family.
fhh_add_family.li1: We automatically add your parents and grandparents for you.
fhh_add_family.li2: Tell us about your immediate family, including your brothers, sisters, children, aunts, and uncles.
fhh_add_family.li3: You can add more family members like cousins, nieces, nephews, half siblings, and grandchildren later.
fhh_add_family.li4: We collect information only for blood relatives, not household members, not step-relatives, nor spouses (unless related by blood).
fhh_add_family.brothers: How many brothers do you have?
fhh_add_family.sisters: How many sisters do you have?
fhh_add_family.sons: How many sons do you have?
fhh_add_family.daughters: How many daughters do you have?
fhh_add_family.muncles: How many brothers does your mother have? (your uncles)
fhh_add_family.maunts: How many sisters does your mother have? (your aunts)
fhh_add_family.puncles: How many brothers does your father have? (your uncles)
fhh_add_family.paunts: How many sisters does your father have? (your aunts)

fhh_load_save.no_file_chosen_error2: and choose a file to upload.
fhh_load_save.choose_a_file: Please choose a file to upload
fhh_load_save.load_from_file: Load Your Personal Information from a File
fhh_load_save.load_file_instructions1: In this step, you can open your family health history from a previously-saved XML data file on your computer or portable storage device.
fhh_load_save.load_file_instructions2: Press 'Browse...' to select a file on your computer, then press 'Open from Computer' to open it
fhh_load_save.load_health_vault: Load Your Personal Information from Microsoft's Health Vault
fhh_load_save.load_health_vault_instructions: Microsoft HealthVault lets you gather, store, and share health information online. If you choose to copy your family history information from your HealthVault account, this website will copy data from your HealthVault account and will need you to sign in.
fhh_load_save.load_google_drive: Load Your Personal Information from Google Drive
fhh_load_save.load_google_drive_instructions: You can load a pre-saved file from Google Drive, by signing into your google drive account.
fhh_load_save.load_dropbox: Load Your Personal Information from Dropbox
fhh_load_save.load_dropbox_instructions: You can load a pre-saved file from Dropbox, by signing into your dropbox account and picking a file to load.
fhh_load_save.save_instructions_title: Why save your family health history file?
fhh_load_save.save_instructions: To respect individual privacy concerns, this website does not save your family health history information. However, you can save your family health history to your own local storage area (such as your computer's hard drive, a CD-ROM, or USB thumb drive). In addition, you can save to a third-party system such as Microsoft® HealthVault, Google Drive, and Dropbox (other third party systems will be added in the future). Some hospitals and doctors' offices will be able to obtain this family health history information stored with a third party system, if you grant them permission, and directly incorporate your family health history into an electronic medical record.
fhh_load_save.save_to_file: Save Your Personal Information to a File
fhh_load_save.save_file_instructions1: In this step, you can save your family health history to your computer or portable storage device as an XML data file. This data file can be opened in this website later to update your family health history.
fhh_load_save.save_file_instructions2: Press 'Save to a File' and your browser will put the file in your preferred download location
fhh_load_save.save_health_vault: Save Your Personal Information to Microsoft's Health Vault
fhh_load_save.save_health_vault_instructions: Microsoft HealthVault lets you gather, store, and share health information online. If you choose to copy your family health history information to HealthVault, this website will copy data to your HealthVault account and need you to sign in.
fhh_load_save.save_google_drive: Save Your Personal Information to Google Drive
fhh_load_save.save_google_drive_instructions: You can save a single file to Google Drive by signing into your google drive account.
fhh_load_save.save_dropbox: Save Your Personal Information to Dropbox
fhh_load_save.save_dropbox_instructions: You can save a file to Dropbox by signing into your dropbox account and picking a location to save and naming the file.
fhh_load_save.fail_to_save: Failed to save to Health Vault. Please save locally and try again.
fhh_load_save.disclaimer: When you choose to copy your family health history information to any third party system, please note that your information will be retained in that system, and will be subject to the terms of use and privacy policy of that system.
fhh_load_save.detailed_instructions_line1: To open a file from your computer or portable storage device (for example, a USB flash drive):
fhh_load_save.detailed_instructions_line2: Note: Unless it has been renamed on your computer, a saved family health history XML file will usually be FamilyHistory.xml or <name>_FamilyHistory.xml (replace <name> with the name of the center person, usually you). Note also that only files originally created with My Family Health Portrait are supported for opening.
fhh_load_save.detailed_instructions_line3: To copy your family health history from your Microsoft HealthVault account:
fhh_load_save.detailed_instructions_line4: Note: A Microsoft HealthVault account is required for this operation. If you don't have a HealthVault account, you can choose to create one when you save your family health history, or by visiting
fhh_load_save.detailed_instructions_line5: In the section above marked Copy from Microsoft® HealthVault™ press the Copy From HealthVault button.
fhh_load_save.detailed_instructions_line6: You will be guided through a series of screens that allow you to sign in to your HealthVault account and copy your family health history information.
fhh_load_save.detailed_instructions_link1: My Family Health Portrait can copy family health history information from HealthVault even if it was not created using this website.
fhh_load_save.detailed_instructions_li1: If you are opening a file from a portable storage device, make sure the device is properly connected and mounted before starting these instructions
fhh_load_save.detailed_instructions_li2: In the section above marked 'Open From Computer' - press the Browse... button
fhh_load_save.detailed_instructions_li3: A file selection box will be displayed - locate and select the previously-saved family health history XML file you wish to open, and press OK or Open on the file selection box (depending on the type of computer or web browser you are using)
fhh_load_save.detailed_instructions_li4: If you are opening a file from a portable storage device, you will need to locate the device in the file selection box to view its contents and then select the file to be opened
fhh_load_save.detailed_instructions_li5: Press the button marked 'Open From Computer' on this screen

fhh_why_ask_ashkenazi.help_para: For certain conditions, such as ovarian and breast cancer, it is important to know if a person has Ashkenazi Jewish heritage for risk assessment purposes.

fhh_diabetes_calculator.elevated_popup_title: You are at an Elevated Risk for Diabetes
fhh_diabetes_calculator.elevated_popup_instructions_line1: You have indicated in your personal health history
fhh_diabetes_calculator.elevated_popup_instructions_line2: Due to this indicator, you are at an elevated risk for Diabetes
fhh_diabetes_calculator.elevated_popup_instructions_line3: Below are links to two letters, a personal letter showing your risks and what your can do about them, and a Physician Letter that you can give to your physician about your risks
fhh_diabetes_calculator.initial_popup_desc_line1: Please check that the information you have added about you and your relatives is complete and correct
fhh_diabetes_calculator.initial_popup_desc_line2: In order to calculate your diabetes risk, we need some additonal information
fhh_diabetes_calculator.initial_popup_date_of_birth_description: Please enter your date of birth:
fhh_diabetes_calculator.initial_popup_had_gestational_diabetes_d: Have you ever had Gestational Diabetes?
fhh_diabetes_calculator.initial_popup_high_blood_description: Do you have High Blood Pressure (Hypertension):
fhh_diabetes_calculator.initial_popup_physical_description: * Physical activity is defined as 150 minutes of moderate exercise per week
fhh_diabetes_calculator.alert:
In order to use this tool, you need to have entered a height and weight,
 and your family's Diabetes Type II history
fhh_diabetes_calculator.instructions_risk: Get your risk for type 2 diabetes based on your personal and family history information
fhh_diabetes_calculator.instructions_learn: Learn which risk factors you may have for type 2 diabetes
fhh_diabetes_calculator.instructions_read: Read and print sharable letters for you and your health care provider explaining your type 2 diabetes risk
fhh_diabetes_calculator.question_gender: 2. Are you a man or a woman
fhh_diabetes_calculator.question_gestational: 3. If you are a woman, have you ever been diagnosed with gestational diabetes?
fhh_diabetes_calculator.question_family_diabetes: 4. Do you have a mother, father, sister or brother with diabetes?
4. Do you have a mother, father, sister or brother with diabetes?
fhh_diabetes_calculator.question_blood_pressure: 5. Have you ever been diagnosed with high blood pressure?
fhh_diabetes_calculator.question_bmi: 7. What is your Body Mass Index? (see chart at right)
fhh_diabetes_calculator.tool_explanation: No risk tool is perfect and your actual risk may be higher or lower than this.  If you have questions about your type 2 diabetes risk, please speak with a health care provider.
fhh_diabetes_calculator.tool_version: This risk tool is based on a version of the Diabetes Risk Test as developed by the American Diabetes Association.  Additional information about the test can be found in: Heikes KE, et al. Diabetes Risk Calculator: a simple tool for detecting undiagnosed diabetes and pre-diabetes. Diabetes Care. 2008 May;31(5):1040-5.
fhh_diabetes_calculator.tool_information: More information about type 2 diabetes risk can be found at:

fhh_colorectal_calculator.instruction2: Get your risk for colorectal cancer based on your personal and family history information
fhh_colorectal_calculator.instruction3: Learn which risk factors you may have for colorectal cancer
fhh_colorectal_calculator.instruction4: Read and print sharable letters for you and your health care provider explaining your colorectal cancer risk
fhh_colorectal_calculator.instruction5: This tool will run a series of tests, one at a time, to determine your risk for colorectal cancer.
fhh_colorectal_calculator.no_history_found: No personal or family history with this test
fhh_colorectal_calculator.history_found: There was personal or family history with this test
fhh_colorectal_calculator.bottom_info1: No risk tool is perfect and your actual risk may be higher or lower than this.  If you have questions about your colorectal cancer risk, please speak with a health care provider.
fhh_colorectal_calculator.bottom_info2: This risk tool is based on information from the United States Preventive Services Task Force and the National Comprehensive Cancer Network®.
fhh_colorectal_calculator.bottom_info3: More information about colorectal cancer risk can be found at:
fhh_colorectal_calculator.bottom_info4: National Cancer Institute Colorectal Cancer Information
fhh_colorectal_calculator.bottom_info5: National Cancer Institute Colorectal Cancer PDQ for Healthcare Professionals:
fhh_colorectal_calculator.personal_information: Need to enter personal and family histories
fhh_colorectal_calculator.past_cancer_risk1: You have had colon cancer in the past.
fhh_colorectal_calculator.past_cancer_risk2: You have had colorectal cancer in the past.
fhh_colorectal_calculator.past_cancer_risk3: You have had rectal cancer in the past.
fhh_colorectal_calculator.past_cancer_risk4: You have had uterine cancer in the past.
fhh_colorectal_calculator.past_cancer_risk5: You have had pancreatic cancer in the past.
fhh_colorectal_calculator.past_cancer_risk6: You have had ovarian cancer in the past.
fhh_colorectal_calculator.past_cancer_risk7: You have had gastric cancer in the past.
fhh_colorectal_calculator.past_cancer_risk8: You have had brain cancer in the past.
fhh_colorectal_calculator.past_cancer_risk9: You have had brain cancer in the past.
fhh_colorectal_calculator.past_cancer_risk10: You have had liver cancer in the past.
fhh_colorectal_calculator.past_cancer_risk11: You have had kidney cancer in the past.
fhh_colorectal_calculator.past_cancer_risk12: You have had Lynch Syndrome/Hereditary non-polyposis colorectal cancer (HNPCC) in the past.
fhh_colorectal_calculator.past_cancer_negative: You have never had any of the following cancer types: colon, colorectal, rectal, Lynch Syndrome/Hereditary non-polyposis colorectal cancer (HNPCC), uterine, pancreatic, ovarian, gastric, brain, liver, or kidney cancer.
fhh_colorectal_calculator.polyps_negative: You have never had any polyps or Familial adnenomatous polyposis (FAP).
fhh_colorectal_calculator.polyps_risk1: You have had colon polyps in the past.
fhh_colorectal_calculator.polyps_risk2: You have had familial adnenomatous polyposis (FAP) in the past.
fhh_colorectal_calculator.ibd_negative: You have never had inflammatory bowel disease (either ulcerative colitis or crohn's disease).
fhh_colorectal_calculator.ibd_risk1: You have had crohn's disease in the past.
fhh_colorectal_calculator.ibd_risk2: You have had ulcerative colitis in the past.
fhh_colorectal_calculator.fap_hnpcc_negative: None of your family members have had Lynch Syndrome/Hereditary non-polyposis colorectal cancer (HNPCC) or Familial adnenomatous polyposis (FAP)
fhh_colorectal_calculator.fap_hnpcc_risk1: has had Lynch Syndrome/Hereditary non-polyposis colorectal cancer (HNPCC) in the past.
fhh_colorectal_calculator.fap_hnpcc_risk2: has had familial adnenomatous polyposis (FAP) in the past.
fhh_colorectal_calculator.family_members_cancer_risk1: has had colon cancer in the past.
fhh_colorectal_calculator.family_members_cancer_risk2: has had colorectal cancer in the past.
fhh_colorectal_calculator.family_members_cancer_risk3: has had rectal cancer in the past
fhh_colorectal_calculator.family_members_cancer_risk4: has had gastric cancer in the past.
fhh_colorectal_calculator.family_members_cancer_negative: None of your immediate relatives (father, mother, brothers, sisters, children) have had colon, colorectal, rectal, or gastric cancer.
fhh_colorectal_calculator.family_members_polyps_risk1: has had colon polyps in the past.
fhh_colorectal_calculator.family_members_polyps_negative: None of your immediate relatives (father, mother, brothers, sisters, children) have had polyps.
fhh_colorectal_calculator.secondary_family_members_cancer_risk1: has had colon cancer in the past.
fhh_colorectal_calculator.secondary_family_members_cancer_risk2: has had colorectal cancer in the past.
fhh_colorectal_calculator.secondary_family_members_cancer_risk3: has had rectal cancer in the past.
fhh_colorectal_calculator.secondary_family_members_cancer_risk4: None of your secondary relatives (aunts, uncles, grandparents, grandchildren, halfsiblings) have had colon, colorectal, or rectal cancer. (There should be two or more to trigger this test.)
fhh_colorectal_calculator.secondary_family_members_cancer_risk5: It takes two or more of your secondary relatives to trigger this test:
fhh_colorectal_calculator.secondary_family_members_cancer_risk6: It takes two or more of your secondary relatives to trigger this test:

has had colon cancer before the age of 60 years or at the age of 60 years.
has had colorectal cancer at an unknown age.

has had rectal cancer at an unknown age.
has had rectal cancer before the age of 60 years or at the age of 60 years.

fhh_colorectal_calculator.secondary_family_members_uterine_cancer_: has had uterine cancer at an unknown age.
has had uterine cancer before the age of 50 years or at the age of 50 years.

None of your primary or secondary relatives (mother, father, sisters, brothers, sons, daughters, aunts, uncles, grandparents, grandchildren, halfsiblings) have had uterine cancer before the age of 50.
has had uterine cancer in the past.
None of your secondary relatives (aunts, uncles, grandparents, grandchildren, halfsiblings) have had uterine cancer. (There should be two or more to trigger this test.)
It takes two or more of your secondary relatives to trigger this test:
It takes two or more of your secondary relatives to trigger this test:
fhh_colorectal_calculator.final_risk1: You have at least one of the above risk factors.  Based on this your risk of colorectal cancer is increased.
fhh_colorectal_calculator.final_risk2: You have none of the above risks.  Therefore your risk of colorectal cancer is average
fhh_colorectal_calculator.additional_info: Additional information about the test can be found in: Feero WG et al. Preliminary validation of a consumer-oriented colorectal cancer risk assessment tool compatible with the US Surgeon General's My Family Health Portrait. Genet Med. 2014 Dec 18. doi: 10.1038/gim.2014.179. http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/25521335

fhh_family_pedigree.title: View Diagram & Table
fhh_family_pedigree.save_image_instructions: To save the image, right click directly on the diagram and choose save image as
fhh_family_pedigree.save_image_instructions_2: To save the image, right click directly on the table and choose save image as
fhh_family_pedigree.desc_line1: Talking with your health care provider about your family health history can help you stay healthy!
fhh_family_pedigree.desc_line2_before_anchor1: Your family health conditions are shown here in a
fhh_family_pedigree.desc_line2_after_anchor2: (below the diagram).  Scroll up and down to see both.
fhh_family_pedigree.desc_line3: Print them to share with your healthcare provider.  Click the ‘Print’ buttons just above the diagram and the table, then follow the instructions.
fhh_family_pedigree.desc_line4: Use the bottom and right scroll bars to view larger tables and diagrams.
fhh_family_pedigree.ie_disclaimer: This feature has been tested and is supported in the following browsers - Internet Explorer 10 and recent versions, Firefox, Chrome, Safari.
fhh_family_pedigree.diagram_options_desc: You can view, save or print your family health history to share with your health care provider. They can assess your risk for certain diseases, and develop disease prevention strategies that are right for you. You can also share the table with other family members to your your family's disease history. You can change what is shown in the table yourself by selecting from the options below. Please select from the options below what you would like to show on your table.
fhh_family_pedigree.diagram_options_disease: Choose a disease or condition to highlight in the diagram:
fhh_family_pedigree.diagram_options_checkbox1: Show my personal information (age, height, weight, and body mass index) at the top of the diagram and table.
fhh_family_pedigree.diagram_options_checkbox2: Show the names of family members in the diagram and table.
fhh_family_pedigree.diagram_options_checkbox3: Show drawing (the tree diagram of your family's health history)
fhh_family_pedigree.diagram_options_checkbox4: Show table (your family's health history displayed as a listing table)
fhh_family_pedigree.csv_line1: Copy the text below and paste it into a text file
fhh_family_pedigree.csv_line4: From the File menu, choose Import
fhh_family_pedigree.csv_line7: Choose the filename saved from step 1

fhh_export.relative_no_name: This relative does not have a name.  In order to export, the relative needs to have a name.  Please add a name and try again
fhh_export.relative_no_gender: This relative does not have a gender.  In order to export, the relative needs to have a gender.  Please add a gender and try again
fhh_export.relative_no_dob: This relative does not have a Date of Birth.  In order to export, the relative needs to be listed as alive and have a valid Date of Birth.  Please add a Date of Birth and try again
